resp:

- 1970 (Portage)

- 1975 (Merrillville)

- 1993 (Crown Point)
- 1995 (Michigan City)
- 2003 (Lake Central)

From this list, the highest year is 2003. The school that joined in 2003 is Lake Central. So, according to the table, Lake Central indeed has the most recent joining year.

Therefore, the claim is TRUE because among all the schools listed, Lake Central joined the conference in 2003, which is later than any other school's joining year.
</think>

The claim states that Lake Central was the most recent team to join the conference. By examining each school's 'year joined', Lake Central has the highest value of 2003, confirming the claim.
